alert.note: Alert for Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 10:29PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Red Willow County through 1100 PM CDT... At 1029 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, or 17 miles northeast of McCook, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bartley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southwestern Nebraska.
